backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with authorization and storage mixins plus extensive resident, physician, medication, and related type definitions including comparison helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files including components, hooks, pages, and styles.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Production deployment checklist detailing verification steps, deployment methods, logging, rollback workflow, and clean rebuild procedures.
frontend/deployment_logs/.gitkeep: Describes the purpose of the deployment logs directory and the types of log and metadata files generated by deployment scripts.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Historical deployment checklist for Version 89 covering manual deployment, retry script usage, and smoke-test requirements.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global border, background, and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the app root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/build-meta.json: Placeholder build metadata file overwritten during deployment.
frontend/scripts/clean_redeploy_producti: Performs a clean frontend rebuild by deleting caches and dist output, injects build metadata, then redeploys to the IC with logging.
frontend/scripts/deploy_version_89_publi: Historical script for retrying the version‑89 publish‑only deployment, building the frontend and deploying to the IC.
frontend/scripts/post_deploy_smoke_test_: Interactive script guiding operators through post‑deployment smoke tests and verifying deployment artifacts.
frontend/scripts/redeploy_production.sh: Rebuilds the frontend with injected metadata and redeploys it to the IC, logging repository state and canister IDs.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_VERSION_89.md: Detailed post-deployment smoke test instructions for Version 89 covering login, authentication, dashboard load, and error monitoring.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring authentication, backend actor initialization, user profile fetching, health checks, and routing.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog form for adding a resident’s ADL record, handling date, activity, assistance level, notes, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog for entering daily vital signs including temperature, blood pressure, pulse, respiration, oxygen levels, and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Dialog to record medication administration for a resident, selecting active meds and submitting time, staff, and notes.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Form dialog for adding a new medication to a resident, capturing dosage, route, times, physician, and notes.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Comprehensive admin‑only dialog to add a new resident with personal data, room info, physicians, pharmacy, insurance, and responsible persons.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog to add a resident weight entry with form fields, validation, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the brand logo with size and mode options and a text fallback if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsIndic: Shows frontend build info and backend canister ID with fallback loading and warning indicators.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Dialog for editing an existing medication with pre-filled values, validation, and update mutation.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Large admin‑gated form for editing all resident details with pre-filled data and multi-section inputs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Initial user profile setup form capturing name and employee ID and saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: File is empty or contains no implementation.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Displays a detailed startup error screen with error details, backend diagnostics, and retry/logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handles login/logout, and restores identities using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and related data, including startup-safe variations using the resilient actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates a fault-tolerant backend actor with timeouts and optional admin initialization, avoiding auto-retry during startup.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes, dialog overrides, and print-specific layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Provides promise timeout handling and helpers to classify backend, network, and timeout errors.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds normalized asset URLs using Vite base paths and cleans double slashes.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Retrieves build metadata from env or fallback file and constructs build identifiers.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Converts dates to/from backend nanoseconds and provides formatting and age calculation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/residentEnumMapping.ts: Maps RoomType and ResidentStatus enums to and from string values used in the UI.
frontend/src/lib/startupDiagnostics.ts: Extracts backend diagnostics and runs a timeout‑protected health check against the canister.
frontend/src/lib/startupTimings.ts: Defines centralized startup timeout constants for actor creation and data loading.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard showing active/discharged residents with admin-only discharge/delete actions and error-handled data fetching.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with a styled card and background image.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Resident profile page displaying detailed info, medication management, and admin-gated editing with loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing missing backend authorization modules and related restoration tasks.
